title: Swirecx
author: Swirecx
content: Hello, I'm a member of the swire.cx team and I will present you our service.We offer VPS and DEDICATED servers for a lot of tasks. We promise to not suspend your vps unless we have a legal request from Switzerland, spamhaus listing or ressources overusage.We are also proud of our fully custom panel built for privacy. You only need a password to signup not even a mail or username and we encourage tor so even us can't know who you are.Here is a non exhaustive list of some of our features :KVM VirtualizationDedicated resourcesNative IPv4 and IPv6Anonymous / Uncensored / Privacy serviceBasic Anti DDoS ProtectionOwn custom hardwareOS Installation using ISO (vnc) (Full Disk Encryption & own ISO Supported)Own custom panelCrypto only payementsHere are some of our plans :|-------------------|-------------------|-------------------|| VPS-1                 | VPS-2                  | VPS-3                 ||-------------------|-------------------|-------------------|| 1x Xeon 5600        | 2x Xeon 5600       | 4x Xeon 5600        || 1GB DDR4             | 2GB DDR4             | 4GB DDR4             || 30GB SSD             | 45GB SSD            | 60GB SSD             || 1Gbit/s 2TB          | 1Gbit/s 3TB          | 1Gbit/s 5TB           ||-------------------|-------------------|-------------------|| Price : 10€/month  | Price : 20€/month  | Price : 35€/month ||-------------------|-------------------|-------------------|Payment methods accepted:We currently accept Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Etherum, Litecoin and Monero.Clearnet :https://swire.cxTor :http://swire5kuxkbauraduz4evmek5vicq3zjjb6ljedjeh6sp2af5biobpqd.onion/
